summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating electrical wiring and equipment, adopting the 1984 Edition of the National Electrical Code, Chapter 296-46, Safety Standards - Installing Electric Wires and Equipment -- Administrative Rules, Section 110-490 of the Washington Administrative Code and the 1984 Seattle Electrical Code Supplement as the Electrical Code of the City of the City of Seattle, amending Chapter 22.300.020 of the Seattle Municipal Code as adopted by Ordinance 109716: and also amending Section 22.900.230A of the Seattle Municipal Code (the Seattle Permit Fee Ordinance (Ordinance 112015), to make it consistent with the Electrical Code.
